page.title: 16TEAMWORK IN LAUGHARNE
page.content: Laugharne has a flourishing Women's Institute which runs needlecraft and keep-fit classes. Also a Royal British Legion meeting monthly in local pubs. Laugharne Ladies Charity Group hold fund-raising functions. OAPs meet monthly, Guides and Brownies meet weekly. The Rugby Club has a licenced Club house and holds sociable events and an annual European Tour. Most of these clubs have Day Outings, a Christmas Dinner or Party. There are two Badminton clubs, the Rugby club has two teams and the Athletic club two cricket teams playing home and away. The Youth club has table tennis and all the pubs have darts teams. Some boating in the estuary and bay with fishing for pleasure and water-skiing in summer. Some ride horses locally, play cards, read and many enjoy gardening.
